00017 #define ENUM_STR_CASE(enumLabel) case enumLabel: return #enumLabel
00018 #define ENUM_STR_DEFAULTCASE(enumLabel) case enumLabel: default: return #enumLabel
00019 #define STR_EQ_ENUM_IF(value, enumLabel) if (value.compare(#enumLabel)) { return enumLabel; }
00020 
00024 struct SimState {
00025     enum Enum {
00026         UNDEFINED = 0,
00027         INIT,
00028         RUN,
00029         PAUSE,
00030         EXIT,
00031         READY,
00032         POST_INIT,
00033         WAIT_FOR_INIT_CONFIRM
00034     };
00035 
00036     static std::string toString(Enum stage)
00037     {
00038         switch (stage) {
00039             ENUM_STR_CASE(INIT);
00040             ENUM_STR_CASE(RUN);
00041             ENUM_STR_CASE(PAUSE);
00042             ENUM_STR_CASE(EXIT);
00043             ENUM_STR_CASE(READY);
00044             case POST_INIT: return "POST-INIT";
00045             ENUM_STR_CASE(WAIT_FOR_INIT_CONFIRM);
00046             ENUM_STR_DEFAULTCASE(UNDEFINED);
00047         }
00048     }
00049 
00050     static Enum fromString(const std::string& stageStr)
00051     {
00052         if (stageStr.compare("INIT") == 0) {
00053             return INIT;
00054         }
00055         else if (stageStr.compare("RUN") == 0) {
00056             return RUN;
00057         }
00058         else if (stageStr.compare("PAUSE") == 0) {
00059             return PAUSE;
00060         }
00061         else if (stageStr.compare("EXIT") == 0) {
00062             return EXIT;
00063         }
00064         else if (stageStr.compare("READY") == 0) {
00065             return READY;
00066         }
00067         else if (stageStr.compare("POST-INIT") == 0) {
00068             return POST_INIT;
00069         }
00070         else if (stageStr.compare("WAIT_FOR_INIT_CONFIRM") == 0) {
00071             return WAIT_FOR_INIT_CONFIRM;
00072         }
00073 
00074         return UNDEFINED;
00075     }
00076 };
00077 
00081 struct RunStage {
00082     enum Enum
00083     {
00084         UNDEFINED = 0,
00085         NONE,
00086         FAIL,
00087         IDLE,
00088         RUN,
00089         PAUSE
00090     };
00091 
00092     static std::string toString(Enum stage)
00093     {
00094         switch (stage) {
00095         case FAIL:
00096             return "fail";
00097         case IDLE:
00098             return "idle";
00099         case RUN:
00100             return "run";
00101         case PAUSE:
00102             return "pause";
00103         case UNDEFINED:
00104             return "undefined";
00105         case NONE:
00106         default:
00107             return "none";
00108         }
00109     }
00110 
00111     static Enum fromString(const std::string& stageStr)
00112     {
00113         if (stageStr.compare("none") == 0) {
00114             return NONE;
00115         }
00116         else if (stageStr.compare("fail") == 0) {
00117             return FAIL;
00118         }
00119         else if (stageStr.compare("idle") == 0) {
00120             return IDLE;
00121         }
00122         else if (stageStr.compare("run") == 0) {
00123             return RUN;
00124         }
00125         else if (stageStr.compare("pause") == 0) {
00126             return PAUSE;
00127         }
00128 
00129         return UNDEFINED;
00130     }
00131 };

00133 class State;

00135 typedef std::map<RunTablePair::first_type, RunTablePair::second_type> RunTable;
00136 typedef std::map<OperationStage::Enum, State*> StatePool;

00165         };
